snippet: A new treatment allows you to spray vitamins onto your face, or whatever body part to which you want to impart a glowing, healthy look.
abstract: A new treatment allows you to spray vitamins onto your face, or whatever body part to which you want to impart a glowing, healthy look.
lead_paragraph: With 2012 under way and New Year's resolutions established (eat fewer frites, exercise more, drink less), why not add a less challenging one - take more vitamins.
